Spring Repository Modifying Update Query

Descripción

Create a Spring Data JPA modifying update query


File Template: ❌


Prefix

spring:repo:update


Scopes

java


Snippet de código

@Modifying
@Transactional
@Query("UPDATE ${1:Entity} e SET e.${2:field} = :${3:value} WHERE e.${4:id} = :${5:idValue}")
int update${6:Field}By${7:Id}(@Param("${3:value}") ${8:Type} ${3:value}, @Param("${5:idValue}") ${9:IdType} ${5:idValue});
